about_the_game:
"Raiders of Valhalla: Prologue" is a free demo for "Raiders of Valhalla". In this sneak peek, take charge of a fearless horde of Viking dwarves as they fight valiantly for Valhalla. Fulfill the divine mission bestowed upon you and gear up for epic battles, all while relishing the chance to immerse yourself in the action and strategy that awaits you!



Unlock an extensive and diverse selection of equipment, ranging from humble to legendary, and enhance each piece to its utmost potential to harness unmatched power and capabilities



Build an army of dwarves with a diverse array of warrior classes, where warriors of the same class can provide group buffs, and each class possesses unique and distinct abilities that set them apart from one another!"



Challenge and conquer mighty bosses of immense power! Defeating these formidable adversaries demands not only sheer strength but also fearless warriors and strategic mastery.



Conquer multiple villages nestled in incredibly wild locales! These villages come in different tiers, each offering varying challenges such as the number of enemies, formidable bosses, and unique regions to explore.

MAIN FEATURES IN THIS DEMO:

• Explore villages of varying levels and challenges.

• Build an army of dwarves with unique abilities.
• Upgrade equipment to strengthen your troops.
• Confront powerful bosses to earn rewards.
• Collect coins as loot after raids.
• Utilize synergy among warriors of the same class.

SEE WHAT AWAITS YOU IN THE FULL GAME:

Core Gameplay Elements:
• Dwarf Clan Management
• City Invasions
• Character Classes and Progression
• Tactical Challenges

Mechanics and Strategy:
• Special Abilities and Blessings
• Boss Battles
• Reinforcements and Battle Strategy
• Viking Ship

Progression and Narrative:
• Resource Gathering
• Progression Manager
• Story Integration

Progression and Customization:
• Equipment Enhancement
• Legendary Weapons
• Forge System
• Pet Companions
• Skill Tree Development

And much more in the full game! Check the Raiders of Valhalla page on Steam!

name: Raiders of Valhalla - Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Not Required

short_description: Lead a fearless horde of Viking dwarves, strengthen them with legendary equipment, conquer unknown lands, and witness the colossal destruction they leave behind. How far will you be able to take your warriors? The journey to glory begins now!
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
